definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The road ahead for Libya and its people will be difficult and full of challenges.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚面前的路将充满坎坷和挑战。

sentences.english: So, those are the reasons predominantly why people cannot get out themselves.
sentences.chinese: 这就是人们为什么无法从利比亚撤出的主要原因。

sentences.english: More than 50 people in the Libyan capital Tripoli have died after drinking tainted alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚首都的黎波里50多人饮用毒酒身亡。

sentences.english: The IMB is likely to lead in Libyia as well.
sentences.chinese: 看起来IMB很可能是利比亚的新领导者了。

sentences.english: The Libyan air campaign could not have been fought without American help.
sentences.chinese: 离开美国的帮助，利比亚空战也无从展开。

sentences.english: It was this effective combination of tools that helped liberate Libya.
sentences.chinese: 正是这些手段的有效组合帮助利比亚实现了解放。

sentences.english: I'm not really in a position to judge the political situation in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 但是我不好去评价利比亚的政治形势。

sentences.english: Anyone who took up arms against Libya would be executed, he warned.
sentences.chinese: 他警告说，任何反对利比亚的人都会被处死。

sentences.english: A new chapter for Libya, but will the victors stay united?
sentences.chinese: 利比亚翻开了新篇章，但胜利者仍会团结一致吗？

sentences.english: We're offering support to the Libyan opposition.
sentences.chinese: 我们也将为利比亚反对派提供支援。

sentences.english: Victory in Libya comes first in time and importance.
sentences.chinese: 在利比亚取得胜利，在时间和重要性上应排在第一。

sentences.english: The Scottish government engaged Libya and the United Kingdom on the matter of releasing al-Megrahi.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰政府也参与了利比亚和英国释放迈格拉希事件。

sentences.english: The Libyan government says three of the Libyan leader's grandchildren also died.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚政府表示，利比亚领袖的三个孙子也被炸死。

sentences.english: The Libyan government says three of the Libyan leader's grandchildren also died.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚政府表示，利比亚领袖的三个孙子也被炸死。

sentences.english: But Senator McCain is looking ahead to a post-Gadhafi Libya.
sentences.chinese: 但是麦凯恩参议员却在展望后卡扎菲时代的利比亚。

sentences.english: Libya's foreign ministry declared victory. Its glee was understandable.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚外交部宣布胜利，喜悦之情是可以理解的。

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
(Colonel Muammar) Gaddafi (1942-2011), de facto leader of Libya from 1969-2011
Tripoli, capital of Libya/Tripoli, city in north Lebanon
nations of the Persian Gulf/Gulf states
